revision.text: Possibly: Devout exercises of the heart in meditation and soliloquy, prayer and praise. By the late ... Mrs. Rowe. Reviewed and published at her request by I. Watts, D.D. To which is added her wish. (By Elizabeth Singer Rowe; Isaac Watts). (Dublin, 1750). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/181874303
